categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starship classes

nodes.text: The Scurrg H-6 Bomber was a bomber utilized by the Alliance to Restore the Republic. Malee Hurra once piloted one.
The Scurgg H-6 was introduced into canon in the miniatures game Star Wars: Armada. It originated in Star Wars Legends in the video game Star Wars: Starfighter.
